term1.company: City of Edmonton - Edmonton Transit Service
term1.jobdescription: Implemented a network monitoring system (NMS) for over 10000 network devices. Developed modules and support for various devices for LibreNMS - an open source NMS

term2.position: Software Developer and Quality Assurance Student
term2.jobdescription: Developed an in-house tool using the WPF Framework. The application stores data about network devices into an SQL database for a user to query and print information to send to clients.
